flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Phoebe will be 10+5 = <<10+5=51>>51 years old.
If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be 4*51 = <<4*51=204>>204 years old in 5 years.
Currently, Raven is 204-5 = <<204-5=199>>199 years old.
#### 199

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
